tit.cmt: 「まいづる智恵蔵」のウェブページで‘Maizuru Wisdom Warehouse’と訳されていました。

sen.j: まいづる智恵蔵（まいづるちえぐら）は、京都府舞鶴市の文化施設。
sen.e: Maizuru Wisdom Warehouse, called “Maizuru Chiegura” in Japanese, is a cultural facility in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Maizuru Wisdom Warehouse, called “Maizuru Chiegura” in Japanese, is a cultural facility in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Maizuru Wisdom Warehouse, called "Maizuru Chiegura" in Japanese, is a cultural facility in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 全角の”を半角にしました。

sen.j: 舞鶴港ウォーターフロントにある博物館とギャラリーを中心としている。
sen.e: It features repositories and galleries on the Maizuru Port waterfront.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It features cultural exhibitions and art galleries on the Maizuru Port waterfront.
It features cultural exhibitions and art galleries on the Maizuru Port waterfront.

sen.j: 舞鶴市による赤レンガ倉庫再利用の3棟目として、2007年4月に開館した。
sen.e: It opened in April 2007 as the third red brick warehouse reused by Maizuru City.
It opened in April 2007 as the third red brick warehouse reused by Maizuru City authorities.
sen.cmt: I think it needs to be clear who 'Maizuru City' is - i.e. the title of the local government office.
sen.e: It opened in April 2007 as the third red brick warehouse reused by Maizuru City authorities.
Summary
Summary
Summary

sen.j: 明治35年（1902年）に舞鶴鎮守府兵器廠の弾丸庫並小銃庫として建設された赤れんが倉庫を再利用した文化施設である。
sen.e: The cultural facility is a reused red brick warehouse, which was originally built as the Maizuru Naval Arsenal Bullets and Rifles Warehouse in 1902.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The cultural facility is housed in a reused red brick warehouse which was originally built as the Maizuru Naval Arsenal Bullets and Rifles Warehouse in 1902.
The cultural facility is housed in a reused red brick warehouse which was originally built as the Maizuru Naval Arsenal Bullets and Rifles Warehouse in 1902.

sen.j: 館内には内壁を利用した長大なギャラリーや舞鶴市の文化財を展示するコーナーなどが設置されている。
sen.e: Inside the facility, there are galleries utilizing its grand inner walls, a section showing Maizuru City's cultural assets, and so on.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Inside the facility there are galleries which utilize its grand inner walls and a section showing Maizuru City's cultural assets.
Inside the facility there are galleries which utilize its grand inner walls and a section showing Maizuru City's cultural assets.

sen.j: 再利用するにあたっては、竣工時の外観に防衛庁防衛研究所に保管されている設計図と仕様書を基にして戻された。
sen.e: To reuse this red brick warehouse, the outer appearance at the time of its completion was restored on the basis of its blueprint and specifications held by the National Institute for Defense Studies of the Ministry of Defense.

In restoring this red brick warehouse the outer appearance at the time of its original completion was recreated following the specifications of the blueprints held by the National Institute for Defense Studies of the Ministry of Defense.

In restoring this red brick warehouse the outer appearance at the time of its original completion was recreated following the specifications of the blueprints held by the National Institute for Defense Studies of the Ministry of Defense.
Inside the Building
Inside the Building
Inside the Building

sen.j: 赤れんが倉庫復元展示エリア
sen.e: Exhibition on the Red Brick Warehouse Restoration
Exhibition on the Red Brick Warehouse Restoration
Exhibition on the Red Brick Warehouse Restoration

sen.j: - 入換動車、日本国有鉄道中舞鶴線沿線復元ジオラマ、旧中舞鶴線の資料等を展示。
sen.e: Exhibited are a freight-car shunting vehicle, a diorama of the country along the restored Japan National Railways (JNR) Naka-maizuru Line, materials about the old Naka-maizuru Line, and so on.
sen.cmt: 「入換動車」の定訳がありません。
sen.e: A freight-car shunting vehicle, a diorama of the country along the restored Japan National Railways (JNR) Naka-maizuru Line, and materials connected to the old Naka-maizuru Line are among many things exhibited here.

A freight-car shunting vehicle, a diorama of the country along the restored Japan National Railways (JNR) Naka-maizuru Line, and materials connected to the old Naka-maizuru Line are among many things exhibited here.

tit.j: 入換動車には、かつて福知山運転所で使用されていた国鉄DB10形ディーゼル機関車であるとの説明が付けられている。
tit.e: It is explained that the freight-car shunting vehicle is a JNR Diesel Locomotive Type DB10 which was once used in Fukuchiyama rail yard.
tit.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
tit.e: There is an explanation about the freight-car shunting vehicle being a JNR Diesel Locomotive Type DB10 which was once used in Fukuchiyama rail yard.
There is an explanation about the freight-car shunting vehicle being a JNR Diesel Locomotive Type DB10 which was once used in Fukuchiyama rail yard.

sen.j: しかし、DB10形は全車解体され現存していないので何らかの誤りであると思われる。
sen.e: But because all the Type DB10 diesel locomotives were scrapped and none of them exists now, this explain must be some kind of mistake.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: However, as all the Type DB10 diesel locomotives were scrapped and none of them currently exist, this explanation cannot be correct.
However, as all the Type DB10 diesel locomotives were scrapped and none of them currently exist, this explanation cannot be correct.

sen.j: 縄文時代丸木舟展示エリア
sen.e: Exhibition on a Canoe from the Jomon Period
Jomon Period Canoe Exhibition
Jomon Period Canoe Exhibition

sen.j: - 浦入遺跡から出土した日本最古級とされる約5,300年前の縄文丸木舟（市指定文化財）の実物をはじめとする浦入遺跡出土品を展示
sen.e: Exhibited are excavated articles at Uranyu site, including a genuine canoe from the Jomon period (municipally-designated cultural property) which is said to be the oldest class of articles about 5,300 years ago.

Exhibited here are articles excavated from the Uranyu site, including a genuine canoe from the Jomon Period (a municipally-designated cultural property), said to be the oldest of its kind, dating from about 5,300 years ago.

Exhibited here are articles excavated from the Uranyu site, including a genuine canoe from the Jomon period (a municipally-designated cultural property), said to be the oldest of its kind, dating from about 5,300 years ago.
Projects Exhibition area
Projects Exhibition Area
Projects Exhibition Area

sen.j: - 建物内壁を活用した総延長220mのギャラリー
sen.e: Galleries utilizing the building's inner walls which have a combined total length of 220m
Galleries utilizing the building's inner walls and having a combined total length of 220m
Galleries utilizing the building's inner walls and having a combined total length of 220m

sen.j: 糸井文庫浮世絵展示エリア
sen.e: Exhibition on Ukiyoe (Japanese woodblock prints) of the Itoi Bunko Library
Exhibition on Ukiyoe (Japanese woodblock prints) from the the Itoi Bunko Library
Exhibition on Ukiyoe (Japanese woodblock prints) from the Itoi Bunko Library
sen.cmt: 余分なtheを削除しました。

sen.j: - 市指定文化財の糸井文庫約2,200点の資料から、丹後地方に関する浮世絵など数十点を展示。
sen.e: Exhibited are dozens of Ukiyoe and other prints related to the Tango region, which are chosen from about 2,200 materials of the Itoi Bunko Library, municipally-designated cultural property.
Dozens of Ukiyoe and other prints relating to the Tango region are exhibited here, chosen from about 2,200 materials in the Itoi Bunko Library, a municipally-designated cultural property.
Dozens of Ukiyoe and other prints relating to the Tango region are exhibited here, chosen from about 2,200 materials in the Itoi Bunko Library, a municipally-designated cultural property.
